title: Shameless Gangster - Novel Updates
tags: Long Separations   Lovers Reunited   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Multiple Protagonists   Non-linear Storytelling   Organized Crime   Teachers
author: Bai Shan Hei Shui   Hei Shui Bai Shan   白山黑水   黑水白山
description: Han Jia had once encouraged Jiang Xiao Ning to work at a so-called high class escort place called​ Jin Ting. He had drugged him and offered him to his good friend Xiao Li who adamantly refused. Awoken from his stupor, Jiang Xiao Ning was only full of contempt and hatred for Han Jia. Unfortunately, after a series of strange circumstances, some memories of the past reawaken a string of childhood jealousy-breeding a complex yet subtle feeling for this romance. Would this youngster’s love have the strength to convince Han Jia? Once they meet again, how would the two interpret the sorrow and joy of life?>
